app.description: Create shipping labels straight from your ticket sidebar.
app.name: UPS Label App

business_address.label: Business Address
business_address.helpText: The street address to be used as your shipping address

support_email.label: Support Email
support_email.helpText: An email address where your support can be reached by the customer

user_address_field.label: User Address Field
user_address_field.helpText: The name of your 'User Field' in Zendesk where the customer's address is stored. (e.g. 'address')

user_city_field.label: User City Field
user_city_field.helpText: The name of your 'User Field' in Zendesk where the customer's city is stored.

user_state_field.label: User State Field
user_state_field.helpText: The name of your 'User Field' in Zendesk where the customer's state is stored.

user_zip_field.label: User Zip or Postal Code Field
user_zip_field.helpText: The name of your 'User Field' in Zendesk where the customer's zip or postal code is stored.

user_country_field.label: User Country Code Field
user_country_field.helpText: The name of your 'User Field' in Zendesk where the customer's 2-letter country code is stored.

small_size_width.helpText: Define the dimensions for the sizes given to your agents in a dropdown field.

ups_access_number.label: UPS Access License Number
ups_access_number.helpText: The access number for your UPS.com developer account

editable_form.label: Make shipto address editable to agents?
